mapper.insert: insert into orderdetails (orderNumber, productCode, quantityOrdered, priceEach, orderLineNumber) values (#{ordernumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantityordered,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceeach,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderlinenumber,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.select: select orderNumber, productCode, quantityOrdered, priceEach, orderLineNumber from orderdetails
